org.digijava.kernel.viewmanager

Interface ViewConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractViewConfig, DefaultTemplateViewConfigImpl, DefaultViewConfigImpl, DefaultViewConfigUtil, TemplateViewConfigImpl, ViewConfigImpl, ViewConfigUtil

    public interface ViewConfig
    Describes site's view configuration

    • Method Detail

      • isUpToDate

        boolean isUpToDate()
        Returns true if configuration is up to date (no files were changed, etc). false if something was changed and reload is needed
        Returns:
        true if configuration is up to date, false - if not

      • reload

        void reload()
     throws ViewConfigException
        Reloads view configuration
        Throws:
        ViewConfigException - if error occurs during reload

      • getTeaserActionPath

        java.lang.String getTeaserActionPath(java.lang.String moduleName,
                                     java.lang.String instanceName,
                                     java.lang.String teaserName)
        Returns action path for specific teaser
        Parameters:
        moduleName - name of the module, which owns teaser
        instanceName - name of the instance
        teaserName - name of the teaser. If null - return action for the default teaser
        Returns:
        action path for specific teaser

      • getFilePath

        java.lang.String getFilePath(java.lang.String fileName)
                      throws ViewConfigException
        Deprecated. this method will be removed after refactoring
        Searches file in the site's root directory and underlying repository (template, etc)
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file
        Returns:
        file path. null if file was not found
        Throws:
        ViewConfigException

      • getPagePath

        java.lang.String getPagePath(java.lang.String pageName,
                             boolean appendExtension)
                      throws ViewConfigException
        Deprecated. this method will be removed after refactoring
        Returns path of the JSP page from site's 'layouts' directory.
        Parameters:
        pageName - name of the page (header, footer, etc)
        appendExtension - true, if .jsp extension should be appended to pageName and false, if not
        Returns:
        Returns path of the JSP page
        Throws:
        ViewConfigException - if error occurs

      • getFilePath

        java.lang.String getFilePath(java.lang.String moduleName,
                             java.lang.String moduleInstance,
                             java.lang.String pageName,
                             java.lang.String teaserName)
                      throws ViewConfigException
        Deprecated. this method will be removed after refactoring
        Find file's path for given site, module and instance. File can be layout file (header, footer, etc. moduleName==null, moduleInstance==null), default teaser file (pageName == null && teaserName == null), secondary page (pageName != null, teaserName == null), non-default teaser file (pageName == null, teaserName != null)
        Parameters:
        moduleName - name of the module. If null - assume layout
        moduleInstance - name of the module's instance
        pageName - name of the page
        teaserName - name of the non-default teaser
        Returns:
        file's path
        Throws:
        ViewConfigException

      • getMainLayoutPath

                            throws ViewConfigException
        Deprecated. this method will be removed after refactoring
        Returns path for the layout file
        Parameters:
        layoutName - name of the layout
        Returns:
        path for the layout file
        Throws:
        ViewConfigException

                                 java.lang.String moduleInstance,

        Deprecated. this method will be removed after refactoring
        Returns teaser's action for the given module, instance and teaser name
        Parameters:

        teaserName - name of the teaser

      • getMasterContextAttributes

        java.util.Map getMasterContextAttributes(java.lang.String layoutName)
                                  throws ViewConfigException
        Assemble context attributes for master layout. This method puts correct filenames int tiles context to pass them to master layout
        Parameters:
        layoutName - name of the layout in site-config.xml file
        Returns:
        context attributes for master layout
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if error occurs
        ViewConfigException
